Text:

Thanks for the heads up over the early showing in Canada, I was astonished how quick this had appeared. All kudos must go to the legendary EZTV, its going to be so sad when this last series ends, best Lost season ever!

Damn EZ! That's fast! My jaw's still on the floor when Widmore opened that locked door in the submarine and it was Aaron and Ji Yeon inside! Such a Man from Tallahassee moment! And  I was totally convinced it was Desmond too! Omg did he kidnap them?? What an asshole! Too bad Jack's dying though spoilers.
